attacks.name: Spike Armor
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if Sandslash is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Sandslash is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Spike
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, that Pokémon is now Poisoned.
